Home

Post: Image (Standard)

05 Aug 2010

The preferred way of using images is placing them in the /images/ directory and referencing them with an absolute path. Prepending the filename with {{ site.url }}/images/ will make sure your images display properly in feeds and such.

Standard image with no width modifier classes applied.

HTML:

<img src="{{ site.url }}/images/filename.jpg" alt="">

or Kramdown:

![alt]({{ site.url }}/images/filename.jpg)
